column4: BRIEF-New Oriental Education Says Q3 Revenues Up 41.2% YOY To $618.1 mln
column5: April 24 (Reuters) - New Oriental Education & Technology Group Inc:
column6: * NEW ORIENTAL ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE THIRD FISCAL QUARTER ENDED FEBRUARY 28, 2018
column7: * Q3 REVENUE $618.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $599.9 MILLION
column8: * QTRLY NON-GAAP NET INCOME PER ADS ATTRIBUTABLE $0.57 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
